name: Here Together
description:
Here Together is a card game about authenticity and vulnerability. About the struggles each of us face. About the things we try to hide or avoid.

In sharing our secret inner lives, there is opportunity for reflection, connection and empowerment. We can dispel shame, support one another and feel less alone. We can take courage in the spirit of humanity and our collective truths. We can learn to live.

After all, we're here together.

---

  1. Download the game template "here-together.pcio".
  2. Go to https://playingcards.io/
  3. Scroll down till near the bottom of the page.
  4. You should find the "Import a Game File" button. Select it and upload the "here-together.pcio" file.
  5. A virtual room should load automatically. Share the room code to invite other players. You can then play the card game virtually.
  6. Use Zoom, Discord or any other communication platform with a video call function to interact with one another during the game.
